        public Score<P> getScore(S groupKey,
                int ordinal)
        Description copied from interface: Character
        Retrieves a score from the given type. Note that if a score stands alone, ordinal can be left as 0.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        groupKey - The type of score for a finite set of scores desired
        ordinal - The index in the order of the score

      • getActions

        public List<Action> getActions()
        Description copied from interface: Character
        Gets the set of actions the character is capable. This should mostly match up with actions as defined in DnD Only case in which it might not match up is while out of battle
        Specified by:
        getActions in interface Character<S extends BasicScoreGroupType,P>

      • getHistory

        public List<Event> getHistory()
        Retrieves the full list of events. Ideally, the list of events could be used to reconstruct a character. This gives a potential avenue for serialization that, while perhaps less efficient, I believe should be more capable.
        Specified by:
        getHistory in interface Character<S extends BasicScoreGroupType,P>
        Returns:
        A full list of events usable to rollback a character entirely.
